7.en: This wary Pokémon uses photosynthesis to store up energy during the day, while becoming active at night.
7.ja: 警戒心が　強い。　昼は 光合成で　力を　溜めて 夜になったら　活動開始。

8.en: At a distance, it launches its sharp feathers while flying about. If the enemy gets too close, Rowlet switches tactics and delivers vicious kicks.
8.ja: 飛行しながら　切れ味　鋭い 羽根を　飛ばし　近距離では 強烈な　キックを　叩きこむ。

7.en: A bit of a dandy, it spends its free time preening its wings. Its preoccupation with any dirt on its plumage can leave it unable to battle.
7.ja: 気取り屋で　暇が　あれば　翼の 手入れ。　羽毛の　汚れが　気に なりすぎて　戦えないことも。

8.en: It throws one knifelike feather after another at its enemies, and each one precisely strikes a weak point. These feathers are known as blade quills.
8.ja: 刃羽根　と　呼ばれる　ナイフのような 羽根を　立て続けに　投げて　敵の 急所を　確実に　つらぬく。

7.en: It fires arrow quills from its wings with such precision, they can pierce a pebble at distances over a hundred yards.
7.ja: 翼に　仕込まれた　矢羽を 番えて放つ。　１００メートル先の 小石も　貫く　精度。

8.en: As if wielding a bow, it launches the arrow quills hidden among the feathers of its wings. Decidueye’s shots never miss.
8.ja: 翼に　仕込まれた　矢羽根を 弓矢のように　つがえて　放つ。 狙った　的は　外さない。

7.en: While grooming itself, it builds up fur inside its stomach. It sets the fur alight and spews fiery attacks, which change based on how it coughs.
7.ja: 毛づくろいで　お腹に　溜まった 抜け毛を　燃やして　火を　吹く。 毛の　吐きかたで　炎も　変化。

8.en: It spends even the smallest amount of downtime grooming its fur with its tongue. Loose fur gathers in its stomach and serves as fuel for fiery moves.
8.ja: 暇さえあれば　舐めて　毛づくろい。 お腹に　たまった　抜け毛に　火を つけて　炎技を　放つ。

7.en: At its throat, it bears a bell of fire. The bell rings brightly whenever this Pokémon spits fire.
7.ja: 首の　付け根に　炎の　鈴が ある。　炎が　噴きだすとき リンリンと　高い音が　鳴る。

8.en: In the midst of battle, the fire pouch on Torracat’s neck rings like a bell and produces stronger flames than usual.
8.ja: 首の　付け根の　炎袋は 戦いに　なると　火力が 上がり　鈴のような　音を　出す。

7.en: This Pokémon has a violent, selfish disposition. If it’s not in the mood to listen, it will ignore its Trainer’s orders with complete nonchalance.
7.ja: 粗暴で　身勝手な　性格。 気分が　乗らなければ　トレーナーの 命令も　平気で　無視するぞ。

8.en: It excels at violent, no-holds-barred battles. The temperature of the flames that issue from its navel exceeds 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.
8.ja: 摂氏２０００度を　超える　炎を へそから　噴き出す。　ルール無用の 乱暴な　戦いが　得意。

7.en: This Pokémon snorts body fluids from its nose, blowing balloons to smash into its foes. It’s famous for being a hard worker.
7.ja: 頑張り屋な　性質で　有名。 体液を　鼻で　膨らませた バルーンを　敵に　ぶつける。

8.en: It creates special bouncy balloons to send at its opponents. When the balloons pop, the sheer force of their bursting is what deals damage.
8.ja: 弾力があり　破裂した　ときの 衝撃で　相手を　痛めつける 特別な　バルーンを　作る。

7.en: A skillful dancer, it creates a sequence of water balloons as it dances, and briskly bombards its enemies.
7.ja: ダンスが　得意で　踊りながら 次々に　水の　バルーンを 作りだし　敵に　ぶつけるぞ。

8.en: As if dancing, it artfully dodges the attacks of its enemies. All the while, it’s busy forming a bunch of balloons to overwhelm its foes.
8.ja: ダンスの　ステップで　敵の　技を かわしながら　バルーンを　次々と つくって　攻撃を　たたみかける。

7.en: It controls its water balloons with song. The melody is learned from others of its kind and is passed down from one generation to the next.
7.ja: 水のバルーンを　歌で　操る。 そのメロディは　仲間に　学び 代々　群れに　引き継がれていく。

8.en: With its mouth, it makes sonic waves that sound like beautiful singing. It uses the sonic waves to control its water balloons.
8.ja: 口から　発する　音波で　水の バルーンを　操る。　音波は 清らかな　歌声に　聞こえる。

7.en: It can peck at a rate of 16 times a second to drill holes in trees. It uses the holes for food storage and for nesting.
7.ja: 秒間１６連打　で　木を　突き 穴を　ほる。　開けた　穴は　餌を 仕舞う　貯蔵庫や　巣に　使う。

7.en: It eats berries and stores their seeds in its beak. When it encounters enemies or prey, it fires off all the seeds in a burst.
7.ja: クチバシに　喰った　きのみの　タネを 溜め込む。　敵や　獲物に 出会うと　一気に　発射する。

7.en: When it battles, its beak heats up. The temperature can easily exceed 212 degrees Fahrenheit, causing severe burns when it hits.
7.ja: クチバシを　発熱させ　戦う。 その温度は　１００度を　優に　超え 突かれるだけで　大火傷。

7.en: With its sharp fangs, it will bite anything. It did not originally live in Alola but was imported from another region.
7.ja: 鋭いキバで　なんにでも　かみつく。 元々　アローラには　棲んでおらず 他の地方から　連れてこられた。

7.en: When it finds a trace of its prey, it patiently stakes out the location...but it’s always snoozing by nightfall.
7.ja: 獲物の　痕跡を　みつけると 粘り強く　その場に　張り込むが 日暮れには　うつらうつら　している。

7.en: Its strong jaw enables it to scrape trees and slurp out the sap. It normally lives underground.
7.ja: 丈夫な　顎で　樹木を 削り　樹液を　すする。 普段は　地面の　中で　暮らす。

8.en: Its natural enemies, like Rookidee, may flee rather than risk getting caught in its large mandibles that can snap thick tree branches.
8.ja: 大きな　顎は　太い　枝を へし折る　威力。　天敵の ココガラも　たまらず　逃げだす。

7.en: Its body is capable of storing electricity. On camping trips, people are grateful to have one around.
7.ja: 体内に　蓄電機能を　持つ。 キャンプの　ときなど　１匹　いると とても　ありがたい　ポケモンだ。

8.en: While its durable shell protects it from attacks, Charjabug strikes at enemies with jolts of electricity discharged from the tips of its jaws.
8.ja: 頑丈な　殻で　身を　守る。 顎の　先端から　電気を 流して　反撃する。

7.en: It zips around, on sharp lookout for an opening. It concentrates electrical energy within its large jaws and uses it to zap its enemies.
7.ja: 飛び回って　隙を　うかがう。 電気エネルギーを　大きなアゴで 収束させ　敵に　発射。

8.en: It builds up electricity in its abdomen, focuses it through its jaws, and then fires the electricity off in concentrated beams.
8.ja: お腹で　発電した　電気を 大きな　顎で　収束させて 大出力の　ビームを　撃つ。

7.en: While guarding its weak points with its pincers, it looks for an opening and unleashes punches. When it loses, it foams at the mouth and faints.
7.ja: ハサミで　弱点を　ガードしつつ 隙を　うかがい　パンチを　放つ。 負けたほうは　泡を　ふいて　ダウン。

7.en: It aimed for the top but got lost and ended up on a snowy mountain. Being forced to endure the cold, this Pokémon evolved and grew fur.
7.ja: トップを　目指すはずが　雪山に 迷い登り　寒さに　耐えるうちに 毛が　生えてきて　進化していた。

7.en: It beats its wings together to create fire. As it moves in the steps of its beautiful dance, it bathes opponents in intense flames.
7.ja: 羽を　打ち合わせて　発火。 華麗な　ステップを　踏みながら 激しい　炎を　浴びせかけるぞ。

7.en: It feeds on the nectar and pollen of flowers. Because it’s able to sense auras, it can identify which flowers are about to bloom.
7.ja: 花のミツや　花粉が　餌。 オーラを　感じる　力を　持ち 咲きそうな　花を　見分けている。

8.en: Nectar and pollen are its favorite fare. You can find Cutiefly hovering around Gossifleur, trying to get some of Gossifleur’s pollen.
8.ja: 花粉や　蜜が　大好物。 ヒメンカの　花粉を　狙って アブリーが　近くを　飛びまわる。

7.en: It rolls up pollen into puffs. It makes many different varieties, some used as food and others used in battle.
7.ja: 花粉を　丸め　団子を　つくる。 食用　から　戦闘用　まで たくさんの　種類が　あるよ。

8.en: It makes pollen puffs from pollen and nectar. The puffs’ effects depend on the type of ingredients and how much of each one is used.
8.ja: 花粉と　蜜を　混ぜて　団子を つくる。　調合する　種類や 量に　よって　効果が　違う。

7.en: It’s considered to be a good Pokémon for beginners because of its friendliness, but its disposition grows rougher as it grows up.
7.ja: よく　なつくので　初心者に お勧めのポケモンと　いわれるが 育つと　気性は　荒くなる。

8.en: This Pokémon can bond very strongly with its Trainer, but it also has a habit of biting. Raising a Rockruff for a long time can be challenging.
8.ja: よく　懐くが　噛み癖が　あるので ずっと　育てるには なかなか　骨が　折れるぞ。

7.en: Its quick movements confuse its enemies. Well equipped with claws and fangs, it also uses the sharp rocks in its mane as weapons.
7.ja: 素早く　動き　敵を　惑わす。 ツメや　キバの　ほか　タテガミの とがった　岩も　武器の　ひとつ。

8.en: This Lycanroc is calm and cautious. The rocks jutting from its mane are razor sharp.
8.ja: 冷静　かつ　慎重。 たてがみの　岩の　切れ味は 剃刀のように　鋭い。

7.en: When it’s in trouble, its eyes moisten and begin to shine. The shining light attracts its comrades, and they stand together against their enemies.
7.ja: ピンチになると　目が　潤みだし 輝く。　その光に　群れる 仲間と　敵に　立ち向かうのだ。

8.en: Individually, they’re incredibly weak. It’s by gathering up into schools that they’re able to confront opponents.
8.ja: １匹では　とても　ひ弱なため 群れることで　敵に　立ち向かう 能力を　獲得した。

7.en: It plunges the poison spike on its head into its prey. When the prey has weakened, Mareanie deals the finishing blow with its 10 tentacles.
7.ja: 頭に　ある　毒トゲで　獲物を ズブリ。　弱ったところを　１０本の 触手で　捕らえ　止めを　刺す。

8.en: The first symptom of its sting is numbness. The next is an itching sensation so intense that it’s impossible to resist the urge to claw at your skin.
8.ja: 棘に　刺されると　まず　痺れに 襲われ　やがて　掻きむしりたくなる ほどの　痒みに　苦しむのだ。

7.en: Toxapex crawls along the ocean floor on its 12 legs. It leaves a trail of Corsola bits scattered in its wake.
7.ja: １２本の足で　海底を　はう。 ドヒドイデの　はったあとには サニーゴのカスが　散らばっている。

8.en: To survive in the cold waters of Galar, this Pokémon forms a dome with its legs, enclosing its body so it can capture its own body heat.
8.ja: ガラル地方の　冷たい　水温に 耐えるため　脚で　ドームを　つくり 内部を　体温で　温める。

7.en: The mud stuck to Mudbray’s hooves enhances its grip and its powerful running gait.
7.ja: 足に　まとわりついた　泥が グリップに　なり　力強い 走りを　実現しているのだ。

8.en: Loads weighing up to 50 times as much as its own body weight pose no issue for this Pokémon. It’s skilled at making use of mud.
8.ja: 体重の　５０倍の　荷物を 軽々と　運ぶ　力持ち。 泥の　扱いに　長けている。

7.en: It spits a mud that provides resistance to both wind and rain, so the walls of old houses were often coated with it.
7.ja: 口から　吐く　泥は　固まると 雨風にも　強いので　昔の 家の　壁には　よく塗られている。

8.en: Mud that hardens around a Mudsdale’s legs sets harder than stone. It’s so hard that it allows this Pokémon to scrap a truck with a single kick.
8.ja: 泥で　固めた　脚は　岩よりも 硬くなり　一撃で　トラックを 破壊する　威力を　生み出す。

7.en: It crawls onto the land in search of food. Its water bubble allows it to breathe and protects its soft head.
7.ja: 餌を　求め　地上に　あがる。 水泡を　被るのは　呼吸と 柔らかい　頭を　守るため。

8.en: It forms a water bubble at the rear of its body and then covers its head with it. Meeting another Dewpider means comparing water-bubble sizes.
8.ja: お尻で　水泡を　膨らませて 頭を　包む。　仲間同士で 水泡の　大きさを　比べる。

7.en: It delivers headbutts with the water bubble on its head. Small Pokémon get sucked into the bubble, where they drown.
7.ja: 頭部の　水泡で　ヘッドバット。 小さなポケモンで　あれば　そのまま 水泡に　取り込まれ　溺れ死ぬ。

8.en: It launches water bubbles with its legs, drowning prey within the bubbles. This Pokémon can then take its time to savor its meal.
8.ja: 脚で　水泡を　飛ばして 獲物を　包みこみ　溺れさせる。 時間を　かけて　味わうのだ。

7.en: During the day, it sleeps and soaks up light. When night falls, it walks around looking for a safer place to sleep.
7.ja: 昼間は　光を浴びて　眠り 夜に　なると　より　安全な 寝床を　探し　歩き出す。

8.en: When bathed in sunlight, this Pokémon emits a pleasantly sweet scent, which causes bug Pokémon to gather around it.
8.ja: 太陽の　光を　浴びると 甘く　よい香りが　するので 虫ポケモンたちが　寄ってくる。

7.en: It requires a lot of effort to maintain Lurantis’s vivid coloring, but some collectors enjoy this work and treat it as their hobby.
7.ja: 鮮やかな　体色を　保つには 非常に　手間が　かかるが　それを 趣味にする　好事家も　いるのだ。

8.en: This Pokémon resembles a beautiful flower. A properly raised Lurantis will have gorgeous, brilliant colors.
8.ja: 美しい　花の　ポケモン。 うまく　育った　ラランテスは 素晴らしい　あざやかさを　もつ。

7.en: It scatters spores that flicker and glow. Anyone seeing these lights falls into a deep slumber.
7.ja: 点滅しながら　発光する　胞子を あたりに　ばら撒く。　その光を 見た者は　深い眠りに　おちる。

8.en: Pokémon living in the forest eat the delicious caps on Morelull’s head. The caps regrow overnight.
8.ja: 頭の　傘は　とても　美味しい。 森の　ポケモンたちに　食べられるが 一晩で　再生する。

7.en: Forests where Shiinotic live are treacherous to enter at night. People confused by its strange lights can never find their way home again.
7.ja: 夜中に　マシェードの棲む　森に いくのは　危険。　怪しい光に 惑わされ　二度と　帰れなくなる。

8.en: Its flickering spores lure in prey and put them to sleep. Once this Pokémon has its prey snoozing, it drains their vitality with its fingertips.
8.ja: 点滅する　胞子の　光りで 獲物を　おびき寄せて　眠らせる。 指先から　生気を　吸い取る。

7.en: It burns its bodily fluids to create a poisonous gas. When its enemies become disoriented from inhaling the gas, it attacks them.
7.ja: 体液を　燃やし　毒ガスを　たく。 ガスを　吸った　敵が　フラフラに なったあと　襲いかかるのだ。

8.en: Its venom sacs produce a fluid that this Pokémon then heats up with the flame in its tail. This process creates Salandit’s poisonous gas.
8.ja: 毒袋で　つくった　体液を しっぽの　炎で　熱して 毒ガスを　発生させる　仕組み。

7.en: For some reason, only females have been found. It creates a reverse harem of male Salandit that it lives with.
7.ja: なぜか　♀しか　見つかっていない。 ヤトウモリの♂を　引き連れて 逆ハーレムを　作って　暮らす。

8.en: Only female Salazzle exist. They emit a gas laden with pheromones to captivate male Salandit.
8.ja: エンニュートは　メスしか　いない。 フェロモンガスを　発生させて オスの　ヤトウモリを　魅了する。

7.en: Despite its adorable appearance, when it gets angry and flails about, its arms and legs could knock a pro wrestler sprawling.
7.ja: 愛くるしい　見た目だが　怒って ジタバタする　手足に　ぶつかると プロレスラーでも　吹っ飛ばされる。

8.en: Its fluffy fur is a delight to pet, but carelessly reaching out to touch this Pokémon could result in painful retaliation.
8.ja: ふわふわの　毛並みは　触り心地が 抜群だが　うかつに　手を　だすと 手痛い　反撃を　受けてしまう。

7.en: This immensely dangerous Pokémon possesses overwhelming physical strength. Its habitat is generally off-limits.
7.ja: 圧倒的な　筋力を　持つ 非常に　危険な　ポケモン。 生息地は　基本　立ち入り禁止。

8.en: Once it accepts you as a friend, it tries to show its affection with a hug. Letting it do that is dangerous—it could easily shatter your bones.
8.ja: 仲間と　認めると　愛情を 示すために　抱きしめようとするが 骨を　砕かれるので　危険。

7.en: A delectable aroma pours from its body. They are often swallowed whole by Toucannon lured by that wafting deliciousness.
7.ja: 美味しそうな　香りが　体から 漏れ出している。　匂いに　誘われた ドデカバシに　丸呑みに　される。

8.en: Its body gives off a sweet, fruity scent that is extremely appetizing to bird Pokémon.
8.ja: 体から　漏れ出す　果実の 甘い　においが　鳥ポケモンの 食欲を　激しく　刺激する。

7.en: The sepals on its head developed to protect its body. These are quite hard, so even if pecked by bird Pokémon, this Pokémon is totally fine.
7.ja: 身を　守るため　ヘタが　発達。 かなりの　硬さで　とりポケモンに 突かれても　全然　平気だ。

8.en: As it twirls like a dancer, a sweet smell spreads out around it. Anyone who inhales the scent will feel a surge of happiness.
8.ja: 踊るように　ターンして　甘い 香りを　ふりまく。　その　においを 嗅ぐと　幸せな　気持ちになる。

7.en: Its long, striking legs aren’t just for show but to be used to kick with skill. In victory, it shows off by kicking the defeated, laughing boisterously.
7.ja: 脚を　活かした　蹴りが　得意。 倒した　相手を　足蹴に　して 高笑いで　勝利を　アピール。

8.en: This feared Pokémon has long, slender legs and a cruel heart. It shows no mercy as it stomps on its opponents.
8.ja: すらりと　伸びた　脚と　残忍な 心を　もち　恐れられている。 敵を　容赦なく　踏みにじる。

7.en: It attaches flowers to its highly nutritious vine. This revitalizes the flowers, and they give off an aromatic scent.
7.ja: 栄養満点の　ツルに　花を くっつける。　花は　活性化し 香しい　アロマが　漂いだす。

8.en: Comfey picks flowers with its vine and decorates itself with them. For some reason, flowers won’t wither once they’re attached to a Comfey.
8.ja: ツルを　使って　花を　摘み 自分を　飾る。　体に　ついた 花は　なぜか　枯れない。

7.en: Known for its extreme intelligence, this Pokémon will look down on inexperienced Trainers, so it’s best suited to veteran Trainers.
7.ja: 非常に　賢いことで　知られる。 未熟な　トレーナーは　見下す ベテラン向けの　ポケモンだぞ。

8.en: With waves of its fan—made from leaves and its own fur—Oranguru skillfully gives instructions to other Pokémon.
8.ja: 葉っぱと　体毛で　つくった 軍配を　振って　ポケモンたちを 意のままに　操ることが　できる。

7.en: They form groups of roughly 20 individuals. Their mutual bond is remarkable—they will never let down a comrade.
7.ja: ２０匹前後の　グループを　つくる。 その結束は　非常に　固く 絶対　仲間を　見捨てない。

8.en: Displaying amazing teamwork, they follow the orders of their boss as they all help out in the search for their favorite berries.
8.ja: ボスの　指示に　従い　見事な チームプレイで　好物の　木の実を 探して　仲間同士　助け合う。

7.en: This Pokémon is a coward. As it desperately dashes off, the flailing of its many legs leaves a sparkling clean path in its wake.
7.ja: 臆病で　たくさんの　足を ばたつかせ　必死に　逃げまわる。 逃げたあとは　ピカピカ　綺麗。

8.en: It’s nature’s cleaner—it eats anything and everything, including garbage and rotten things. The ground near its nest is always clean.
8.ja: 腐ったものや　ゴミでも　なんでも 食べまわる　自然の　掃除屋。 巣の　まわりは　いつも　きれい。

7.en: With a flashing slash of its giant sharp claws, it cleaves seawater—or even air—right in two.
7.ja: 鋭く　巨大な　ツメで 一閃。　空気や　海水さえ 一刀両断の　腕前。

8.en: It will do anything to win, taking advantage of every opening and finishing opponents off with the small claws on its front legs.
8.ja: 勝つためには　手段を　問わない。 相手の　隙を　ついて　前脚の 小さな　ツメで　とどめを　刺す。

7.en: Born from a sand mound playfully built by a child, this Pokémon embodies the grudges of the departed.
7.ja: 行き倒れた者の　怨念が 子どもが　つくった　砂山に 取りつき　誕生　したのだ。

8.en: Grudges of the dead have possessed a mound of sand and become a Pokémon. Sandygast is fond of the shovel on its head.
8.ja: 砂山に　死者の　怨念が　宿り ポケモンに　なった。 頭の　スコップは　お気に入り。

7.en: Possessed people controlled by this Pokémon transformed its sand mound into a castle. As it evolved, its power to curse grew ever stronger.
7.ja: 人を　操り　砂の山を 砂の城まで　進化　させた。 呪いの　力も　あがっている。

8.en: Palossand is known as the Beach Nightmare. It pulls its prey down into the sand by controlling the sand itself, and then it sucks out their souls.
8.ja: ビーチの　悪夢とも　呼ばれる。 砂を　操って　獲物を　沈め 魂を　吸い取る。

7.en: It lives in shallow seas, such as areas near a beach. It can eject its internal organs, which it uses to engulf its prey or battle enemies.
7.ja: ビーチなど　浅い　海に　棲む。 身体から　体内器官を　だして 餌を　捕ったり　敵と　戦う。

8.en: It’s covered in a slime that keeps its skin moist, allowing it to stay on land for days without drying up.
8.ja: 温かい　浅瀬で　暮らす。 敵に　出会うと　体内器官を 口から　出して　殴りつける。

7.en: The heavy control mask it wears suppresses its intrinsic capabilities. This Pokémon has some hidden special power.
7.ja: 重い　制御マスクを　つけており 本来の　能力を　だせない。 特別な　力を　秘めている。

8.en: Rumor has it that the theft of top-secret research notes led to a new instance of this Pokémon being created in the Galar region.
8.ja: 極秘だった　研究資料が 盗まれ　ガラル地方で　新たに つくりだされたと　噂されている。

7.en: Its trust in its partner is what awakens it. This Pokémon is capable of changing its type, a flexibility that is well displayed in battle.
7.ja: パートナーとの　信頼で　覚醒。 自在に　タイプを　チェンジする 能力を　発揮し　戦う。

8.en: A solid bond of trust between this Pokémon and its Trainer awakened the strength hidden within Silvally. It can change its type at will.
8.ja: パートナーとの　強い　絆により 秘めた　能力が　覚醒した。 自在に　タイプを　変えられる。

7.en: Originally making its home in the ozone layer, it hurtles to the ground when the shell enclosing its body grows too heavy.
7.ja: もともと　オゾン層に　棲んでおり 身体の　殻が　重くなると 地上に　向かって　落ちてくる。

7.en: It is born asleep, and it dies asleep. All its movements are apparently no more than the results of it tossing and turning in its dreams.
7.ja: 寝たまま　生まれ　寝たまま　死ぬ。 すべての　行動は　みている 夢に　よる　寝相　らしい。

7.en: The shell on its back is chemically unstable and explodes violently if struck. The hole in its stomach is its weak point.
7.ja: 背中の　甲羅は　爆発物。 うっかり　殴れば　大爆発。 お腹の　穴が　弱点。

8.en: Explosive substances coat the shell on its back. Enemies that dare attack it will be blown away by an immense detonation.
8.ja: 爆薬で　コーティングされた 甲羅を　背負う。　攻撃してきた 敵を　大爆発で　返り討ち。

7.en: The spiny fur on its back is normally at rest. When this Pokémon becomes agitated, its fur stands on end and stabs into its attackers.
7.ja: 背中の　ハリの　毛は　普段は 寝ている。　興奮すると　逆立ち 襲ってくる　敵を　突き刺すのだ。

8.en: With the long hairs on its back, this Pokémon takes in electricity from other electric Pokémon. It stores what it absorbs in an electric sac.
8.ja: 背中の　長い　毛で　雷や でんきポケモンの　電撃を　受けて 電気袋に　充電する。

7.en: Its actual appearance is unknown. A scholar who saw what was under its rag was overwhelmed by terror and died from the shock.
7.ja: 正体不明。　ボロ布の 中身を　みた　とある　学者は 恐怖の　あまり　ショック死した。

8.en: It wears a rag fashioned into a Pikachu costume in an effort to look less scary. Unfortunately, the costume only makes it creepier.
8.ja: 怖がられないように　ピカチュウに 似せた　ボロ布を　かぶっているが 余計に　不気味に　なってしまった。

7.en: When it unleashes its psychic power from the protuberance on its head, the grating sound of grinding teeth echoes through the area.
7.ja: 頭の　突起から　サイコパワーを 放つとき　とても　耳障りな 歯ぎしりの　音が　あたりに　響く。

7.en: It has a compassionate personality, but if it is angered, it completely destroys its surroundings with its intense breath.
7.ja: 心優しい　性質。　だが 一度　怒りに　かられると　激しい 息吹で　あたりを　破壊　し尽くす。

8.en: The mountains it calls home are nearly two miles in height. On rare occasions, it descends to play with the children living in the towns below.
8.ja: 標高３０００メートルを　超える 山で　暮らす。　まれに　街へ やって来て　子どもたちと　遊ぶ。

7.en: Swinging its massive anchor, it can KO Wailord in a single blow. What appears to be green seaweed is actually its body.
7.ja: でかい　錨を　ブンブン　振り回し ホエルオーさえ　一撃で　ＫＯ。 緑の　モズクが　本体だ。

8.en: After a piece of seaweed merged with debris from a sunken ship, it was reborn as this ghost Pokémon.
8.ja: 海底を　漂う　藻屑が 沈没船の　部品を　取りこんで ゴーストポケモンに　生まれ変わった。

7.en: It expresses its feelings by smacking its scales. Metallic sounds echo through the tall mountains where Jangmo-o lives.
7.ja: ウロコを　叩き　気持ちを　伝える。 ジャラコの　棲む　高山では 金属音が　木霊する。

8.en: They learn to fight by smashing their head scales together. The dueling strengthens both their skills and their spirits.
8.ja: 頭の　ウロコを　仲間同士で ぶつけ合い　戦い方を　学ぶ。 技と　気持ちが　鍛えられる。

7.en: It leaps at its prey with a courageous shout. Its scaly punches tear its opponents to shreds.
7.ja: 雄叫びと　ともに　獲物に 飛びかかる。　ウロコの　パンチは 相手を　ズタズタに　引き裂くぞ。

8.en: The scaleless, scarred parts of its body are signs of its strength. It shows them off to defeated opponents.
8.ja: ウロコが　はがれた　傷だらけの 体は　強者の　証し。 倒した　相手に　見せつける。

7.en: When it spots enemies, it threatens them by jingling the scales on its tail. Weak opponents will crack and flee in panic.
7.ja: 敵を　見ると　尻尾の　ウロコを ジャラジャラ　鳴らして　いかく。 弱い者は　あわてて　逃げ出す。

8.en: It clatters its tail scales to unnerve opponents. This Pokémon will battle only those who stand steadfast in the face of this display.
8.ja: 敵に　出会うと　しっぽの　ウロコを 打ち鳴らし　威嚇。　怖気づかない 強者だけを　相手に　戦う。

7.en: This guardian deity of Melemele is brimming with curiosity. It summons thunderclouds and stores their lightning inside its body.
7.ja: 好奇心旺盛な　メレメレの 守り神。　雷雲を　呼び 雷を　身体に　溜め込む。

7.en: This guardian deity of Akala is guilelessly cruel. The fragrant aroma of flowers is the source of its energy.
7.ja: 無邪気で　残酷な　アーカラの 守り神。　花の　芳しい 香りが　エネルギーの　源。

7.en: It pulls large trees up by the roots and swings them around. It causes vegetation to grow, and then it absorbs energy from the growth.
7.ja: 大木を　引き抜き　ブンブン 振り回す。　草木を　茂らせて そのエネルギーを　吸収する。

7.en: The dense fog it creates brings the downfall and destruction of its confused enemies. Ocean currents are the source of its energy.
7.ja: 深い霧で　敵を　惑わせ 自滅させる　恐ろしさを　持つ。 海流が　エネルギーの　源。

7.en: Its body is gaseous and frail. It slowly grows as it collects dust from the atmosphere.
7.ja: はかない　ガス状の　身体。 大気の　チリを　集めながら ゆっくりと　成長していく。

8.en: This Pokémon came from another universe. Its gaseous body is so light that even a gentle breeze can blow it away.
8.ja: 別の　宇宙から　やって来た。 ガスの　体は　とても　軽く そよ風にも　流れてしまうほどだ。

7.en: Motionless as if dead, its body is faintly warm to the touch. In the distant past, it was called the cocoon of the stars.
7.ja: 死んだように　まったく　動かないが 触れると　ほのかに　温かい。 大昔は　星の繭と　呼ばれた。

8.en: The absorption of starlight fuels this Pokémon’s growth. The shell that encases it is harder than any known material.
8.ja: 人知を　超えた　硬さの　殻に 包まれている。　星の　光を 浴びて　成長する。

7.en: It is said to live in another world. The intense light it radiates from the surface of its body can make the darkest of nights light up like midday.
7.ja: 別世界に　棲むと　いわれる。 全身から　激しい光を　放ち 闇夜も　真昼のように　照らすのだ。

8.en: When light radiates from its body, this Pokémon could almost appear to be the sun. It will dispel any darkness and light up the world.
8.ja: 全身から　光を　発して まるで　太陽の　姿になると 闇を　消して　世界を　照らす。

7.en: It is said to be a female evolution of Cosmog. When its third eye activates, away it flies to another world.
7.ja: コスモッグが　進化した　♀だと いわれる。　第３の　眼が　浮かぶとき 別世界へと　飛び去っていく。

8.en: Known as the Beast That Calls the Moon, this Pokémon lives by taking in any and all light and converting it into its own energy.
8.ja: 月を　誘いし　獣　という 名前を　もつ。　あらゆる　光を エネルギーに　変えて　生きている。

7.en: One of several mysterious Ultra Beasts. People on the street report observing those infested by it suddenly becoming violent.
7.ja: 謎に　包まれた　ＵＢの　一種。 街ゆく　人が　寄生され 暴れだす　姿が　目撃された。

7.en: This Ultra Beast appeared from another world. It shows off its body, but whether that display is a boast or a threat remains unclear.
7.ja: 別世界から　現れた　ＵＢ。 自らの　身体を　みせつけてくるが 自慢なのか　いかくなのか　不明。

7.en: One of the dangerous Ultra Beasts, it has been spotted running across the land at terrific speeds.
7.ja: 危険なＵＢの　一種。　凄まじい 速度で　大地を　疾走する 姿が　目撃　されている。

7.en: One of the mysterious life-forms known as Ultra Beasts. Astonishing electric shocks emanate from its entire body, according to witnesses.
7.ja: 全身から　凄まじい　電撃を ほとばしらせる　光景を　目撃。 謎の　生物　ＵＢの　一種だ。

7.en: It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. Witnesses observed it flying across the sky at high speed.
7.ja: ウルトラホールから　現れた。 高速で　空を　飛ぶ　姿が 目撃　された　ウルトラビースト。

7.en: This Ultra Beast came from the Ultra Wormhole. It seems not to attack enemies on its own, but its sharp body is a dangerous weapon in itself.
7.ja: ウルトラホールから　現れた　ＵＢ。 自ら　敵を　襲わないようだが 鋭い　全身は　凶器だ。

7.en: It has gobbled mountains and swallowed whole buildings, according to reports. It’s one of the Ultra Beasts.
7.ja: 山を　喰らい　削り　ビルを 飲みこむ　姿が　報告　された。 ウルトラビーストの　一種。

7.en: Reminiscent of the Ultra Beasts, this life-form, apparently asleep underground, is thought to have come from another world in ancient times.
7.ja: 地下で　眠りに　ついていたようだ。 太古に　別世界から　やってきたと おもわれる　ＵＢらしき　生物。

8.en: It survives by absorbing light. After a long time spent slumbering underground, impurities accumulated within it, causing its body to darken.
8.ja: 光を　エネルギーに　生きている。 地下で　眠っていたため　体内に 溜まった　不純物で　黒ずむ。

7.en: This artificial Pokémon, constructed more than 500 years ago, can understand human speech but cannot itself speak.
7.ja: ５００年以上前に　造られた 人造ポケモン。　人の　言葉を 理解するが　しゃべれない。

7.en: Able to conceal itself in shadows, it never appears before humans, so its very existence was the stuff of myth.
7.ja: 影の中に　潜むことが　でき 人前に　姿を　みせないので その存在は　幻　だった。

8.en: By slipping into the shadow of a martial arts master and copying their movements, this Pokémon learned the ultimate techniques.
8.ja: 拳法の　達人の　影に 潜って　動きを　コピーしたため 究極奥義を　身につけた。

7.en: This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to be chosen as a first partner in its own world.
7.ja: 異世界に　おいては　旅立ちの パートナーに　選ばれるほど 親しまれている　ウルトラビースト。

7.en: It stores hundreds of liters of poisonous liquid inside its body. It is one of the organisms known as UBs.
7.ja: 体内に　数百リットルの 毒液を　ためている。 ＵＢと　呼ばれる　生物の　一種。

7.en: It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one appears to be made up of many life-forms stacked one on top of each other.
7.ja: ウルトラホールから　出現した。 複数の　生命が　積み上がり １匹を　形成している　ようだ。

7.en: It slithers toward people. Then, without warning, it triggers the explosion of its own head. It’s apparently one kind of Ultra Beast.
7.ja: クネクネ動いて　人に　近付くと 突然　頭を　爆発させた。 ウルトラビーストの　一種らしい。

7.en: It electrifies its claws and tears its opponents apart with them. Even if they dodge its attack, they’ll be electrocuted by the flying sparks.
7.ja: 両手足の　ツメを　帯電させ 相手を　八つ裂き。　かわされても 飛び散る　電撃で　感電させる。

8.en: It runs as fast as lightning strikes, shredding its opponents with its high-voltage claws.
8.ja: 雷に　匹敵する　スピードで 走り　大電圧を　発する ツメで　敵を　八つ裂きにする。

7.en: It melts particles of iron and other metals found in the subsoil, so it can absorb them into its body of molten steel.
7.ja: とろりと　溶けた　鋼の　体。 地中の　鉄分や　金属を 溶かして　吸収する。

8.en: It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating liquid metal within its body is how it generates energy.
8.ja: 金属を　溶かして　食べてしまう。 液体金属を　循環させて 体内で　エネルギーを　つくる。

7.en: Revered long ago for its capacity to create iron from nothing, for some reason it has come back to life after 3,000 years.
7.ja: 鉄を　産み出す　力を　持つと 崇められていた。　３０００年の 時を　経て　なぜか　蘇った。

8.en: At the end of its life-span, Melmetal will rust and fall apart. The small shards left behind will eventually be reborn as Meltan.
8.ja: 寿命が　尽きると　体が 錆びて　崩れる。　やがて　小さな 破片が　メルタンに　復活する。
